description: GUI Usability & Developer Experience — Close the biggest GUI interaction gaps and improve onboarding/process documentation.

context.rationale: v010 delivered async ffprobe, progress reporting, and job cancellation. v011 addresses the remaining GUI gaps (clip CRUD wiring, directory browsing) and developer onboarding friction (.env.example, Windows guidance, impact assessment checks).
constraints: No inter-theme dependencies — themes can execute in parallel
Backend clip CRUD endpoints already exist — BL-075 is frontend-only
showDirectoryPicker() not viable — Firefox/Safari lack support
No label field in clip schema — BL-075 AC3 reference is an error
assumptions: Empty allowed_scan_roots means all directories permitted (confirmed by LRN-017)
Simple <select> dropdown sufficient for video selection in clip form
Sequential await with isLoading guard sufficient for race condition mitigation
IMPACT_ASSESSMENT.md markdown format consumable by auto-dev Task 003 agent

themes.goal: Deliver the missing GUI interaction layer for media scanning and clip management.

features.goal: Add backend directory listing endpoint and frontend browse button to ScanModal.
Add Add/Edit/Delete clip controls to ProjectDetails with form modals and state management.

themes.goal: Reduce onboarding friction and establish project-specific design-time quality checks.

features.goal: Create .env.example with all Settings fields documented.
Add Windows Git Bash /dev/null guidance to AGENTS.md.
Create IMPACT_ASSESSMENT.md with 4 project-specific design checks.
